source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_00<tab>Gaia's recent ordeals have left her rather more subdued than usual.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_00<tab>エデンコアのガイアは、少しバツの悪そうな顔をしている。

source:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_01<tab>The emergence of the dark force within Gaia has provided few answers to the questions that remain concerning its origin and true purpose. With the mysterious entity nowhere to be seen and its host having regained her senses, the rest of the group resume the plan to revitalize the element of ice, this time using Shiva as a basis for the summoning. Upon hearing of the manner in which Ysayle made herself a vessel for the primal's power, Ryne states her desire to use a similar approach. As ice naturally tends towards stasis and stillness, it is the element most closely aligned with Light, and would require far more effort to draw forth and rebalance. She claims this difficulty could be greatly alleviated by directly influencing the flow of aether by using her own body as a conduit, rather than relying solely on Eden. Your role, as ever, is to defeat the primal, although considerable care must be taken to disperse the aether without harming Ryne. As one might expect, Thancred vehemently opposes the plan at first, though he is forced to concede when met with the steely determination in her eyes. You and Ryne focus your thoughts on Shiva, and commence the summoning. With an even greater sense of trepidation than usual, you prepare for a climactic battle with the goddess of ice.

※Eden's Verse: Refulgence can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_01<tab>ガイアと話した。彼女にだけ聞こえる「謎の声」の正体は、いまだわからないが、最後の氷属性の励起を行うことになった。倒すべき相手は、原初世界では憑依型蛮神だった氷神シヴァ。そこで突然、リーンが自らを依り代として、氷神シヴァの疑似神降ろしを行いたいと言い出した。暴走の危険もあるが、世界再生にかけるリーンの「願い」の強さを認めた冒険者たちは、彼女の提案を受け入れる。しっかりと準備を整えて、エデンで大氷河へ向かい、リーンの身に憑依させたシヴァを討滅しよう！

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_02<tab>Despite Ryne's not-so-carefully laid plans going awry almost immediately, the battle reaches a largely satisfactory conclusion, thanks in no small part to the unexpected intervention of Gaia. Her much improved control of her dark powers is instrumental in freeing Ryne from Shiva's possession, and after the ice-aspected aether dissipates, Gaia rushes to aid the Oracle of Light. As Ryne returns to her senses, she and her unlikely savior engage in some light-hearted banter and make various plans for when they return to civilization, including making necklaces from a shard of ice left by Shiva.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_02<tab>シヴァを討滅した。エデンコアに帰還しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_03<tab>Having overcome various obstacles and hardships, you and your companions return to Eden's core. Ryne, in particular, is somewhat worse for wear, although she is also the most eager to see what change has come as a result of the extraordinary events that have unfolded.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_03<tab>シヴァを討滅し、氷属性を励起した。エデンコアの「リーン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_04<tab>With balance restored to the last of the six elements, you return to the camp. For the first time since the Flood of Light, verdant green has returned to the Empty, with tufts of foliage peeking through the now fertile soil. It remains to be seen, however, if the work of rebalancing the ambient aether is truly complete, or if further challenges lie ahead.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_04<tab>リーンと話した。六属性の励起が完了し、無の大地に緑が芽吹いた。リーンの願いは、明日に届いたようだ。そして、ガイアの心にも……。頑張ったリーンを、ねぎらおう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_05<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SEQ_05<tab>

target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_TODO_00<tab>「希望の園エデン：共鳴編4」を攻略

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_TODO_01<tab>Enter Eden's Verse: Refulgence.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_TODO_01<tab>「希望の園エデン：共鳴編4」を攻略

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Ryne.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_TODO_02<tab>リーンと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_000<tab>We still don't know exactly what happened, but at least the danger's passed for now.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_000<tab>ガイアが無事で、本当に安心しました……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_001<tab>Whatever that thing was, it was able to control a vast swarm of sin eaters, much like Vauthry. Then again, it's clearly nothing like a Lightwarden... In any case, it's gone now. I just hope it stays gone.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_001<tab>罪喰いの群体の中に、異質なエーテルの塊があったそうだな。
ヴァウスリーのような大罪喰いというわけではなさそうだが、
あれほどの群れを駆り立てるとは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_002<tab>Though Gaia hath regained consciousness, I surmise that it shall be some time before she is fully recovered from her ordeal.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_002<tab>ガイアに後遺症のようなものは見受けられませんが、
もともと体力があるわけでもないでしょうから、
あまり無理はさせない方がよいでしょう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_010<tab>You've all gone through a lot of trouble on my part. For what it's worth, I'm sorry. Anyway, I've delayed you for long enough. Please, carry on with what you came to do.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_010<tab>なんか、迷惑かけちゃったみたいね……ごめんなさい。
もう大丈夫だから、作戦を再開してくれて構わないわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_011<tab>I'm glad you're back to your usual self, but how are you feeling?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_011<tab>あの、ガイア……心遣いは嬉しいけど、本当に大丈夫なの……？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_012<tab>Much better now, but something is still bothering me. The faerie spoke to me in a dream, and a stream of memories rushed through my mind. I don't recall anything like this happening before, and I'm not sure what it all means.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_012<tab>今回は、「妖精」の声と一緒に、
なにか記憶のようなものが頭の中に流れてきて……
あんなことはこれまで一度もなかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_013<tab>What sort of memories?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_013<tab>なにか思い出したんですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_014<tab>I can't make any sense of them. They were only brief flashes, seen through someone else's eyes. At least, that's what it felt like.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_014<tab>わからない……。
一瞬頭に思い浮かんだのに、それがなんだか理解できないの。
まるで自分の記憶ではないかのよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_015<tab>Minfilia─that is, the first Oracle of Light─once served Hydaelyn as the Word of the Mother.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_015<tab>かつて、最初の光の巫女……ミンフィリアは、
ハイデリンの導きにより「星の代弁者」となった。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_016<tab>If the Oracle of Darkness is her counterpart under Zodiark, then we had best prepare ourselves for the worst.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_016<tab>もし仮に「闇の巫女」というのが、
ゾディアーク側の声を代弁するための存在だとしたら……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_017<tab>Aye, the night's return did tip the aetherial balance towards activity, which may have served to awaken the fragment of His power in the First.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_017<tab>第一世界の月に封じられているであろう、
ゾディアークの分割された力が、昨今闇が取り戻され、
世界全体が活性化していく過程で、目覚めた可能性はあります。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_018<tab>Having thus roused, He did then fix His gaze upon she who had been marked by Darkness─Gaia.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_018<tab>そうなったときに、
闇の巫女としての資質を持っていたガイアが影響を受けた……。
ありえない話ではありませんが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_019<tab>Marked or no, Gaia's still her own person.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_019<tab>光の氾濫を起こした最初の罪喰いエデンと、闇の巫女……。
そこに、どんな関係があるんでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_100_019<tab>Hmm? Everything all right?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_100_019<tab>……ガイア？　どうかした？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_110_019<tab>I-It's nothing.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_110_019<tab>べ、べつに……何でもないわ！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_020<tab>Anyway, let's forget about all that for now. There'll be plenty of time to think it through once the last element's restored.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_020<tab>私のことはもういいから。
属性の励起……あとひとつなんでしょ？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_021<tab>If thou believest thyself well enough, then I see no reason for delay. Let us forthwith attend to the revitalization of ice.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_021<tab>では……改めて、氷属性の励起に臨むといたしましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_022<tab>Shiva, then. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, as the only one here to have actually seen the primal, perhaps you could describe her for us?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_022<tab>氷神シヴァ、だったな。
あの頃はゴタゴタしていたから、記憶も曖昧だ。
どういう蛮神だったか、改めて説明してくれないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_A1_000_001<tab>A woman named Ysayle made herself a vessel for Shiva.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_A1_000_001<tab>イゼルを依り代とした憑依型蛮神

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_A1_000_002<tab>She and the great wyrm Hraesvelgr shared an undying bond.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_A1_000_002<tab>フレースヴェルグの恋人

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_023<tab>So, she summoned into her body the imagined essence of someone who lived over a thousand years ago? That such a thing should be possible...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_023<tab>1200年前の聖女を想像して、自分自身に神降ろしを……？
そんなことができるんですね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_024<tab>To find a kindred spirit in such an ancient and fearsome creature... I can hardly imagine what sort of a person she must've been.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_024<tab>聖竜と心を交わした実在の女性……。
それを願いの力で、蛮神として召喚するだなんて。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_025<tab>The long since departed Shiva was a source of great inspiration to Ysayle, whose method of summoning differed greatly from any we had previously encountered.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_025<tab>通常の蛮神は、信仰心を糧として、
神話上の存在である「神」を降ろしますが……

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_026<tab>By the Echo did she bear witness to the deeds of the noble Shiva, and thus was she moved to dedicate her being to that selfsame cause. 'Twas this devotion that granted her the power of a primal.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_026<tab>超える力を持つイゼルは、
過去視で視た実在の人物を、崇敬の念を以て、
その身に具現化させたのです。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_027<tab>So, she was able to control it herself...?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_027<tab>その身に具現化……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_028<tab>Not getting any funny ideas, are you?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_028<tab>リーン……？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_029<tab>Ah, just thinking aloud, that's all! Anyway, we'd better get going.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_029<tab>あ、いえ、なんでもないです！
それで……疑似神降ろしを行う場所はどこでしょう？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_030<tab>Our journey leadeth to a great glacier situated in the northernmost region of the Empty.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_030<tab>氷属性の励起を行うのに最適な場所は、
永久凍土帯のさらに先にある極北の「大氷河」でしょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_031<tab>I'll get us there as quickly as I can!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_031<tab>それでは、大氷河までエデンを翔ばしますね！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_032<tab>It's time to draw out the aether.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_032<tab>……目的地に到達。
環境エーテルを停滞から解放し、氷属性の励起を開始……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_033<tab>Umm... I was thinking...
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_033<tab>あの、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_034<tab>...That I should go with you this time. I want to be the vessel for Shiva!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_034<tab>今回の疑似蛮神討滅は、私も現地に行きたいんです。
……いえ、本当のことを言うと、私が依り代となって、
氷神の疑似神降ろしを行いたいんです……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_035<tab>Being still and passive by nature, ice is the element that is the most strongly aligned to Light. I'll need to get close and use my own abilities as well as Eden's to draw it out.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_035<tab>氷属性は、六属性の中でも特に停滞に寄った力です。
それを励起させるには、これまで以上に強く、
光の力を制御しなくちゃいけない、だから……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_036<tab>So that the Oracle of Light becometh the Oracle of Ice...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_036<tab>「光の巫女」たるあなたが、
「氷の巫女」イゼルと同じように依り代となる、と……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_037<tab>I cannot claim to be in favor of this stratagem, and yet... The primal we encountered in the Source was summoned in much the same manner. The inherent advantages are undeniable─
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_037<tab>たしかに<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが想起する氷神は、
憑依型蛮神としてのシヴァです。
それゆえに依り代の存在が有利に働く可能性がありますが……

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_038<tab>Absolutely out of the question!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_038<tab>論外だ！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_039<tab>Have you forgotten what <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> does to the primals we summon!? I'm not about to stand by and watch as <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> and Ryne beat the tar out of each other.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_039<tab>自分の身に神降ろしをするということは、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>と闘うということなんだぞ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_040<tab>In any case, the aether only returns to the Empty once the creature's been slain, although it seems you haven't taken that into consideration yet. Presumably, there's a safe way to disperse it, but it's still far too risky.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_040<tab>それがどれだけ危険なことか、わからないわけじゃあるまい。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_041<tab>...I thought you had more sense, Ryne.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_041<tab>まったく、少しは成長したかと思っていたが……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_042<tab>But it's not as bad as it sounds!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_042<tab>サンクレッド……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_043<tab>Were the deiform entity as volatile as the primals we have previously summoned, 'twould be logical to assume that, in her role as conduit, Ryne would be hard-pressed to retain control.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_043<tab>ひとたび依り代となれば、意識を保つことは難しいでしょう。
これまでの疑似蛮神が、猛る精神を宿していたのと同様、
創られた精神が肉体の制御を奪うものと思われます。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_044<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> would have no recourse but to defend <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> by any means necessary, else <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> life be forfeit.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_044<tab>そうとなれば、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんとて、
手加減して討滅できる相手ではなくなりましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_045<tab>I know it's dangerous, but I can't let that hold me back. Please, I've got to try!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_045<tab>……危険はすべて承知しています。
それでも、私にやらせてください！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_046<tab>But I don't see why this is even necessary in the first place. You never had to take risks like this for the other elements.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_046<tab>なぜそこまでこだわる？
これまでの励起だって、成功してきているじゃないか。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_047<tab>Eden possesses almost infinite power, but what would happen if it began acting without my intervention?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_047<tab>成功しているのは、エデンを制御下に置けているからです。
もしエデンが、私たちの制御を離れ、
自律行動をするようになってしまったら、どうなるでしょう？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_048<tab>If it started to feed on the aether, just like other sin eaters, it would undo all of our hard work!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_048<tab>罪喰いとは本来、本能的にエーテルを喰らうもの。
私たちがこれまで頑張って再生してきた属性が、
再び失われてしまう可能性があるんじゃないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_100_048<tab>'Tis a disconcerting eventuality, and one which cannot be dismissed.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_100_048<tab>誠に遺憾ながら……その可能性は否定できません。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_049<tab>I'm worried that even if we realign the elements, things will eventually return to how they were following the Flood.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_049<tab>もしそうだとしたら……
一時的に属性を励起させても意味はない。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_050<tab>But if I train Eden how to nurture the environment rather than drain the life from it, we can leave it to take care of the Empty in our place. I'll channel the aether through myself, and show Eden how it's done!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_050<tab>この先エデンが目覚めてしまっても脅威とならないように、
エーテルの正しい扱い方を……そして私たちの強い決意を、
伝えておきたいんです！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_051<tab>This isn't some house pet we're dealing with! If it all goes wrong, then what?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_051<tab>子どものしつけじゃないのよ？
罪喰いにものを教えるだなんて、できるわけがない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_052<tab>I know this all sounds like I'm taking a leap of faith, but it has been a gamble every step of the way.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_052<tab>この作戦は、最初から「できるわけない」との戦いでした。
だけど、みんなの力で、ここまでたどり着くことができたんです。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_100_052<tab>We've managed to come this far <var 1A 02 /var>because<var 1A 01 /var> of faith─in ourselves and in each other.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_100_052<tab>だから私は、望みたい……
未来のことまで考えて、励起したいんです！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_053<tab><sigh> I've made my feelings on the matter perfectly clear, but what say you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_053<tab>……お前の意見は？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_A2_000_001<tab>With my memories to guide the summoning, what could possibly go wrong?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_A2_000_001<tab>想いは力になる。リーンを信じよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_A2_000_002<tab>I'll hold back as much as possible.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_A2_000_002<tab>暴走しても加減しながら鎮めてみせる

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_056<tab>Ryne, I suppose that if you've got your heart set on this, there's no point trying to dissuade you. Just don't do anything reckless, is that clear?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_056<tab>よし、わかった……いいだろう。
ならばその決意で、作戦を成功に導いてみせるんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_057<tab>As crystal!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_057<tab>はいっ！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_100_057<tab>This is going to work, I promise. I'll make sure of it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_100_057<tab>そんなに心配しないで。
うまくやれるように頑張るから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_110_057<tab>Well, for all our sakes, I certainly hope so. Because if the primal takes over...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_110_057<tab>だ、誰が心配なんか……！
私が言うのもなんだけど、蛮神に意識を乗っ取られたら、
いろいろと大変なことになるんでしょう？　だから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_120_057<tab>It'll be fine. With all of you by my side, I know that whatever happens, it'll work out in the end.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_120_057<tab>……そうなっても、私は絶対に諦めません。
みんなとなら、必ず苦難を乗り越えられると信じています！
そうでしょう？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_130_057<tab>All of us? I hope you're not including me. I can't even deal with my own problems, never mind yours.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_130_057<tab>……私には、何もできないわよ。
自分の正体もわからないのに……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_140_057<tab>It's enough just knowing you're here. Anyway, I've decided to take a leaf out of your book. “I do what I want, when I want.” I've made my decision, so now I have to see it through.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_140_057<tab>何ができるか、なんて関係ない。
大事なのは、自分がどうしたいか、でしょ？
私は食べたいものを食べるって、言ってたじゃない。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_150_057<tab>Yes, but this is a different kettle of fish altogether!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_150_057<tab>自分が、どうしたいか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_160_057<tab>Well, the point is that this is what I want, and I'll do whatever it takes to make it work!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_160_057<tab>私はガイアを信じてる。
必ず一緒に、素敵な明日を迎えましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_058<tab>So, this is how much it means to you...
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_058<tab>リーン……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>Memories of Shiva envelop your mind...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>氷の荒々しき姿……
氷神シヴァとの激闘を強く想起した……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_060<tab>I don't know how...but I can see her too! This might actually work!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_060<tab>私にもイメージが流れてきます……。
これが、氷神シヴァ。
必ず、制御してみせます……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_070<tab>I think Eden is sending your thoughts to me! I see Ysayle... And Shiva... They only wanted peace, a land where dragon and mankind could live side by side.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_070<tab>聖女シヴァが夢見た人と竜の融和……
それは、より良い未来への「願い」でもあったはずです。
その力を、糧に変えてみせます！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_071<tab>With so many things left to chance, all I can do is wait...and pray. Do you think the Twelve can hear me here in the First?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_071<tab>今回ばかりは、何が起こるかまったく想像がつかん。
討滅の前に、万全の準備をしておいてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_072<tab>Both Ysayle and Archbishop Thordan offered their corporeal forms as vessels, unto which the likenesses of preeminent figures from Ishgardian history were projected. However, the nature in which each met their demise is perhaps best not dwelled upon...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_072<tab>イシュガルド建国の英雄を呼び降ろした騎神トールダンも、
また憑依型の神降ろしであったそうですね……。
願いが人を過ちへと導き得るとは、悲しきことです……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_073<tab>So, she's not just waiting for the future to arrive, but actually trying to change it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_073<tab>忘れてたわ……私に我慢なんて概念はないってこと。
明日を変えるため、思ったとおりに生きてやるわ！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_080<tab>Ryne!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_080<tab>リーン！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_081<tab>You were there... I heard you...
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_081<tab>ガイア……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_082<tab>What happened to Shiva? Is she still in control?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_082<tab>無事なの？
シヴァに乗っ取られたりしてない？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_083<tab>No, she's gone... But, Gaia...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_083<tab>私は大丈夫……ガイアが助けてくれたから。
それより、ガイア……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_084<tab>What?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_084<tab>なに？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_085<tab>That hammer... It matches your dress...
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_085<tab>……フォークより重いもの、持てるじゃない。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_086<tab>Hmph. I see you're back to your normal idiotic self.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_086<tab>バカ、こんなときにくだらない冗談……

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_087<tab>Look... Isn't it pretty? Maybe we could take it with us?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_087<tab>ね、これ見て。
とっても綺麗だと思わない？
記念に、持って帰ろうと思うの。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_088<tab>Erm... Ice tends to melt, you know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_088<tab>はぁ？
こんなの、すぐ溶けちゃうんじゃ……

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_089<tab>Not this sort.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_089<tab>永久氷晶だよ？
きっと溶けないよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_090<tab>Well, if you say so.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_090<tab>そうかな……。
フフッ、そうかも。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_091<tab>Anyway, it might even make a nice necklace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_091<tab>じゃあ今度、街に持っていって、
ネックレスに加工してもらおう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_092<tab>That's a brilliant idea!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_092<tab>それ、いい！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_093<tab>Wilt thou not rush to her aid?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_093<tab>行かないのですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_094<tab>Perhaps I'm getting slow in my old age, because it would seem Gaia's beaten me to it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_094<tab>駆け寄ろうとはしたさ。
だが、ガイアの方がずっと早かった。
それを見たら……安心したんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_095<tab>To think that she would be the one to break the ice. Ahem.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_095<tab>あの子はもう、ひとりじゃない。
信じあえる友がいる。
リーンがガイアを信じるなら、俺もガイアを信じる。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_096<tab>They may have gotten off to a rocky start, but I think they'll make quite the pair.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_096<tab>……それが、家族ってものだろう？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_097<tab>Is that a hint of melancholy I detect in thy voice? Something akin to a pining mother bird whose chicks have flown the nest...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_097<tab>あなたもようやく……
子離れができるようになった、ということですね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_098<tab>Father bird, if you don't mind. But aye, you're not entirely wrong.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_098<tab>なるほど、この気持ちは……そういうことか。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_099<tab>Still, when the day finally comes to say good-bye, it heartens me to know she won't be alone.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_099<tab>それならきっと、いつ俺がいなくなっても大丈夫だろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_100<tab>After that, we can go to the Second Serving for coffee biscuits!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_100<tab>ね、ついでにオカワリ亭にも、
コーヒークッキー食べに行こう！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_101<tab>Fine. You win. And if they're anything less than perfection itself, I'll never let you live it down!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_101<tab>それ……マズかったら、許さないからね？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_102<tab>If they're not to your liking...there are plenty of other things to try!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_102<tab>もしダメだったら、そのときは……。
もっと美味しいもの、探しに行こ！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_103<tab>I suppose we both deserve a little treat after all that hard work. Hehe!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_103<tab>しょうがないなぁ。
……フフッ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_104<tab>We certainly do! Hehehe!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_104<tab>アハハハ！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_105<tab>There we were, laughing as if we had not a care in the world. Fleeting though it was, in that moment, I was content.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_105<tab>聞こえるのは、バカみたいな笑い声だけ。
今は、それでいいと思った。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_106<tab>But my life was never meant to be so simple.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_106<tab>そして、これからも……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_110<tab>I've had my share of close shaves, but that was...terrifying, to put it mildly. I can only hope the end justifies the means.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_THANCRED_000_110<tab>まったく、ヒヤヒヤさせてくれる……。
だが、これですべての属性の励起が完了した。
リーンの願いは、「無の大地」にも届いているはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_111<tab>Ice, being most naturally aligned to Light among all elements, did interact with Ryne's innate gifts in ways unforeseen.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_111<tab>最も停滞に近い氷属性を暴走させたことで、
リーンに宿る光属性の力までが、引き出されようとは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_112<tab>Were we not graced with the timely appearance of the Oracle of Darkness, I fear that this tale would have ended somewhat prematurely...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_URIANGER_000_112<tab>相反する闇の力によって、それを押し止められる、
「闇の巫女」ガイアがいてくれたことは僥倖でした。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_113<tab>I let myself get a little carried away there, but I was definitely the one controlling my powers, not the other way around. Even so, I hope I never have to use them again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_GAIA_000_113<tab>さっきは無我夢中だったけど……
少しは自分の力を制御できるようになったみたい。
もう、あんなピンチは御免だけどね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_120<tab>I'm so sorry, everyone. I clearly have a long way to go before I can handle that kind of power.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_120<tab>ごめんなさい、自分から言い出したことなのに、
たくさん迷惑をかけてしまって……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_121<tab>But we achieved what we set out to do, as I had faith we would. So without further ado, let's return to camp and admire our work.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_121<tab>……「無の大地」の様子が気になります。
外に行きましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_130<tab>It's...life!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA205_03791_RYNE_000_130<tab>見てください！
「無の大地」に、緑が……！
